title: 11/10/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/10/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Should Bill Belichick leave the Patriots after this season?

-The real problem in Tampa Bay isn't Bruce Arians calling out Brady

-The Cowboys are too much in their feelings

-Are the Dolphins more of a playoff threat than the Browns?

-The Herd Hierarchy: Colin's top ten teams in the NFL


Guest: Jim Gray, Emmy winning Sportscaster

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
